page.title: 14ONGAR MUSIC CLUB
page.content: Ongar has it's own{Music Club},which holds concerts where professional muscians play every month,except for August.The concerts are performed from eight to about eleven in the evening The Music Club has seventy-five members who all hold season tickets . Every time a concert is held by the Music Club they can guarantee an audience of around{eighty}to{one {hundred}people. Every so often their committee meets to discuss artists who they would like to have performing before their members, but they always book two years in advance. The Music Club is part of Ongars Arts Council which is called{OMEGA,}this stands for Ongar Music Entertainment Group Association. The President of the Music Club is{Sir {Yehudin Menhuin K.B.E .
